string.text: Unnatural Selection
Collect %s samples for Professor Kalancha.

Mutants of the Zone have displayed numerous peculiar adaptations to its anomalous conditions. Please, collect some tissue samples for my research. They might help us persevere in this environment as well.

Mutants of the Zone have displayed numerous peculiar adaptations to its anomalous conditions. Please, collect some tissue samples for my research. They might help us persevere in this environment as well. Collect %s samples.
The samples are in good condition. Very well, I will get to research immediately. Thank you.
Scientific Progress
Find one %s artefact for Professor Kalancha.
Artefacts may provide invaluable data for our research. However, with the many threats we face our men cannot really afford to collect them for me all that often. Could you help me?

Artefacts may provide invaluable data for our research. However, with the many threats we face our men cannot really afford to collect them for me all that often. Could you help me? Find one %s artefact.
Even after all these years they never cease to amaze me. What a wonderful specimen. Thank you for your assistance.
Scarce Supplies
Professor Kalancha requires some additional %s

You see, Spore does his best to provide supplies for us. But even after all these years we are still in a difficult situation. There is no shortage of injuries to treat but our medical supplies are limited. Please, help me supplement our stock.

You see, Spore does his best to provide supplies for us. But even after all these years we are still in a difficult situation. There is no shortage of injuries to treat but our medical supplies are limited. Please, help me supplement our stock. Procure some %s, please.
We are all deeply indebted for your help.
Scientific Progress
Sakharov needs a %s artefact for research.
As you may know, new artefacts have recently appeared in the Zone. I'd like you to collect some research material for me.
As you may know, new artefacts have recently appeared in the Zone. I'd like you to collect some research material for me. I would like you to find a %s and bring it to me, please.
Thank you, sir. This will help immensely in my research.
Scientific Progress
Hermann needs a %s artefact for research.
Well, we could use new research material for once. I suppose you could help us with that.
Well, we could use new research material for once. I suppose you could help us with that. I would like you to find a %s and bring it to me. Your assistance will be rewarded.
Finally. Thank you for your cooperation, here's your payment.
Makarov in a Haystack
Fanatic asked to retrieve lost family heirloom.

So, listen. Some bastards decided to mock a rookie and, well, they hid his Makarov somewhere in the car park. When I found out I quickly got rid of them, but not before giving them a good beating. Still, they didn't tell me exactly where did they hide the pistol. And the boy's sitting over there in a miserable mood. You see, he told me that the Makarov was given to him by his late father, a policeman. It's not right to let him sulk like that. Can you help me find the pistol?

So, listen. Some bastards decided to mock a rookie and, well, they hid his Makarov somewhere in the car park. When I found out I quickly got rid of them, but not before giving them a good beating. Still, they didn't tell me exactly where did they hide the pistol. And the boy's sitting over there in a miserable mood. You see, he told me that the Makarov was given to him by his late father, a policeman. It's not right to let him sulk like that. Can you help me find the pistol? Try to find the Makarov somewhere in the car park. One of the bandits might've taken it.
Well done, thanks. Good people are few and far between in the Zone, and I appreciate your help. Take this money as a reward.
Monster Hunter
There is demand for a %s.
Yes, I've always got some work for you. A wealthy client's interested in a rare mutant part. Bring me to it and I'll make it worth the effort.
Yes, I've always got some work for you. A wealthy client's interested in a rare mutant part. Bring me to it and I'll make it worth the effort. Bring me %s.
Well done, here's your reward.
Professional Hitman
Blackjack wants to collect some %s.
What do you feel when you shoot a stalker? Recoil, huh? Well, show me what you've got.
What do you feel when you shoot a stalker? Recoil, huh? Well, show me what you've got. Do you want to hunt the most dangerous game? Bring me some %s, and I'll pay you well.
Good job. Here's your money.
Night Terror
Blackjack wants to eliminate a dangerous mutant which haunts the Red Forest.

Listen. There've been rumours that a particularly nasty specimen of chimera haunts the Red Forest. Not even whole teams of stalkers are safe. And they say the chimera's pitch black. That just might be the fucker which remodelled my face. So, I want it really, really dead, all right? Gear up and tear it a new asshole.
Excellent job, stalker. Maybe my scars won't itch that much anymore. Well, here's your reward, you deserve it.
Scarce Supplies
Mender wants some additional %s.

There's always something to do in our safe haven. Blokes come back from work with all kinds of gashes, holes and burns to patch up. At this rate I might run out of supplies a bit earlier than the next restock happens, and I don't really wanna add my mates to the long list of people I killed. Help me out, okay?

There's always something to do in our safe haven. Blokes come back from work with all kinds of gashes, holes and burns to patch up. At this rate I might run out of supplies a bit earlier than the next restock happens, and I don't really wanna add my mates to the long list of people I killed. Help me out, okay? Procure some %s. I'll pay you premium for those.
Hey, swell job. Time to treat those whining wankers. Here, that's your reward.
New Zone Order
General Voronin wants to decimate the enemy ranks. Collect %s.

Listen, stalker. We strive to destroy the Zone, although there are enemies who wish to destroy us. Criminals, anarchists and fanatics driven by avarice, ignorance or delusion. While the Zone remains our primary threat, and even though we cannot afford to spark a large-scale conflict, let our enemies know that we shall not tolerate their impudence. Eliminate the fools who dare oppose us.

Listen, stalker. We strive to destroy the Zone, although there are enemies who wish to destroy us. Criminals, anarchists and fanatics driven by avarice, ignorance or delusion. While the Zone remains our primary threat, and even though we cannot afford to spark a large-scale conflict, let our enemies know that we shall not tolerate their impudence. Eliminate the fools who dare oppose us. Bring me several %s as proof of your devotion to the cause.
Excellent job. We are like a mighty bulldozer on our way to ravage the Zone. With that, our enemies know they can only step aside or perish.
Big Game Hunter
Collect %s trophies for General Voronin.

Mutants are a difficult enemy. They cannot be reasoned with and they cannot be deterred. They hunger, and they hunt. The time has come for someone like you to hunt them down. Prove your worth and contribute toward the Zone's destruction.

Mutants are a difficult enemy. They cannot be reasoned with and they cannot be deterred. They hunger, and they hunt. The time has come for someone like you to hunt them down. Prove your worth and contribute toward the Zone's destruction. Bring me %s.
Magnificent trophies. Let me reward your bravery.
Night Terror
Voronin wants to eliminate a dangerous mutant which haunts the Truck Cemetery.

Our patrols reported that a particularly dangerous mutant haunts the Truck Cemetery. The monster has already taken lives of several good Dutyers. That has to stop immediately. Go, search for the beast and destroy it.
Another step toward fulfilling our goal. You will be rewarded.
Tight Security
Kuznetsov wants to collect some %s.

Listen, soldier. The higher-ups want proof that we firmly control the area. That's rather difficult to claim with all the stalkers roaming about. Fortunately, the higher-ups won't check on that personally. As such, I want you to collect some patches that I will show them as proof we've secured the perimeter. Understood?

Listen, soldier. The higher-ups want proof that we firmly control the area. That's rather difficult to claim with all the stalkers roaming about. Fortunately, the higher-ups won't check on that personally. As such, I want you to collect some patches that I will show them as proof we've secured the perimeter. Understood? Bring me some %s and I'll reward your reliability.
Well done, soldier. Here's your bonus.
Scarce Supplies
Rogovets wants some additional %s.

Good day, soldier. Or not so good. This place's extremely dangerous, as you likely know full well. Anyway, we've got plenty of wounded to treat every day and a shortage of supplies to treat them with. Can you help me procure some additional medicaments? I'd be very grateful.

Good day, soldier. Or not so good. This place's extremely dangerous, as you likely know full well. Anyway, we've got plenty of wounded to treat every day and a shortage of supplies to treat them with. Can you help me procure some additional medicaments? I'd be very grateful. Obtain some %s and I will share a part of my paycheck with you.
Thank you, soldier.
Night Terror
Skinflint wants to eliminate a dangerous mutant which haunts the Bloodsucker Village.

You know 'bout the Bloodsucker Village, right? Well, our guys can handle the usual tentacle monsters just fine. But there's been this mean black motherfucker that only comes out to hunt at night. He's already killed a few good mates and I don't want the list to get any longer. Can you put a few bullets in its head for me?
Hah! No more gross tentacle rape for a while. Good job, man.
Scarce Supplies
Skinflint wants some %s.
Hey man. Some of our guys can get a bit too adventurous from time to time. We haven't got enough supplies to treat all of 'em.
Hey man. Some of our guys can get a bit too adventurous from time to time. We haven't got enough supplies to treat all of 'em. Can you bring some %s?
You're awesome, man.
Purge the Infidels
Eidolon wants to collect some %s.

We are besieged. Infidels wish to exploit the almighty Monolith. Driven by avarice. Ignorance. Base desires. On behalf of the Monolith. We act, the guardians. Purge the infidels. Collect their badges. As a trophy. A sign of our unquestionable, superiority. Go, brother. Destroy them all.

We are besieged. Infidels wish to exploit the almighty Monolith. Driven by avarice. Ignorance. Base desires. On behalf of the Monolith. We act, the guardians. Purge the infidels. Collect their badges. As a trophy. A sign of our unquestionable, superiority. Go, brother. Destroy them all. Acquire %s on your mission.
Such devotion. To our glorious cause. Devotion shall be rewarded.
The Greatest Warrior
Collect %s trophies for Eidolon.

Dangerous. Lethal beasts. A gift of the Zone, for us to behold. For us to take. Guardians, providers, as well as a milestone. A way to test our strength. Resolve, and combat prowess. Go, brother. Hunt a mighty hunter, man versus beast.

Dangerous. Lethal beasts. A gift of the Zone, for us to behold. For us to take. Guardians, providers, as well as a milestone. A way to test our strength. Resolve, and combat prowess. Go, brother. Hunt a mighty hunter, man versus beast. Collect %s to prove your worth.
Magnificent trophy. The Monolith is proud. So am I. A reward, for you.
Harvest the Fruit
Eidolon wants to collect a %s artefact.

We protect the Monolith. The Monolith protects us. We serve, and the Zone delivers. Splendid fruit, resplendent with its unequalled brilliance. Powerful, to empower us. Go now, harvest the fruit, brother.

We protect the Monolith. The Monolith protects us. We serve, and the Zone delivers. Splendid fruit, resplendent with its unequalled brilliance. Powerful, to empower us. Go now, harvest the fruit, brother. Harvest a %s, to bolster our strength.
Excellent. Marvellous. A sight to behold. You have got my gratitude, loyal brother.
